parameters: \-It's the energy of a soul that longs to leave
this forsaken land... but is forced to stay.
\-Only the strongest of dark magic is
able to stop a soul from crossing.
\-That's how I've been keeping myself alive for
a millenium. If you can even call this living.
\-1000 years ago, I was one of \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0]'s top generals.
He sent me here with an army of elite monsters to
finish off the last of the humans.
\-The humans had done surprisingly well up until then.
But with the monster army under my command, your
\-The soldiers, the adventurers, the women, the children.
Everyone single last one that was holding out hope.
\-There were so many bodies... it was beautiful.
Apocalypse had assigned me to investigate a
new type of energy, and this was the perfect
\-Soulfire. The energy of a soul being held against its will.
\-I've been here ever since, keeping these souls
captive and absorbing all of their soulfire.
\-\c[18]He\c[0] told me to wait for him to contact
me once more. And so I've waited.
\-And waited. And waited. And waited... all to no avail.
\-You don't understand, do you? You can't POSSIBLY understand!
\-I'm nothing but a shell of my former self. The
soulfire keeping me alive has stripped me of my
own soul, the only thing that made me... me.
\genI'm now but a vessel for this damned energy
that's done nothing but ruin me.
\genI don't know why \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0] left me here to wait, just
to never come back. But I'm still holding out hope. And
when \c[18]he\c[0] finally makes his return, I will be preserved
in the history of \c[18]his\c[0] new world!
\knightThat is correct. You four have done what
no one else could... you have freed all of
\knightAt long last, our souls are free to cross
to the other side... the light at the end
of the tunnel, if you will.
\p2This is... incredible. I never imagined that I'd be meeting
the soul of someone who lived a millenium ago!
\knightMany strange things happen in this world,
young one. You still have much to see.
\knightThis world still remains torn by the
ago. You must save the Overworld!
\knightNow that we've been freed, we do not
have long to stay in this world.
And you mustn't be kept waiting.
